nn.core

Class NeuronUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • nn.core.Unit
      • nn.core.NeuronUnit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogisticUnit, PerceptronUnit

    public abstract class NeuronUnit
extends Unit
    Base class for the non-input units of a NeuralNetwork. Do not include an input for the constant a_0=1.0 (AIMA p. 728) since that will be added automatically.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double delta
      Error term for this NeuronUnit, used during backprop.
      protected double output
      This NeuronUnit's output value.

        public double getOutput()
        Return the output value of this NeuronUnit.
        Specified by:
        getOutput in class Unit

      • getInputSum

        public double getInputSum()
        Return the weighted sum of this NeuronUnit's inputs. This is also used in the backpropagation algorithm which is why I broke it out from the run() method.

      • h_w

        public double h_w(double[] x)
        Return h_w(x) = Threshold(w \cdot [1,x])

      • run

        public void run()
        ``Each unit j first computes a weighted sum of its inputs. Then it applies an activation function g to this sum to derive the output.'' (AIMA p728).
        Specified by:
        run in class Unit

      • activation

        public abstract double activation(double in)
        The activation (threshold) function used by this NeuronUnit. This method must be specified by subclassses.

      • update

        public abstract void update(double[] inputs,
                            double output,
                            double alpha)
        Update the weights of this NeuronUnit using the given input values, the given output value, and learning rate (alpha). This method must be specified by subclassses.
        Specified by:
        update in class Unit
